title: Crows Share a Pie
description: Crows Share a Pie is a delightful story about sharing that also teaches students about fractions. Students will find not one, but eight crows that think sharing is a good thing. As the crows divide their pie into smaller and smaller pieces, the concept of fractions as parts of a whole is reinforced in both the text and the illustrations.
meta: equal, fourths, glided, halves, one-eighth, swooped
Use the reading strategy of retelling to understand a fiction story
Main Idea and Details : Identify main idea and details
Blends : Identify spellings for r-family blends
